summary: The diff shows edits to `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts`, but the provided truncated excerpt does not include the `translations` object entries for `fr` or `de`, so the requested explicit French/German dictionaries cannot be verified from the available evidence. Additionally, two non-requested files (`frontend-file-summaries.txt` and `project_state.json`) were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the `fr: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit French dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts`, providing French values for every existing key in `commonTranslations` (no spreading), preserving emojis/symbols.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` is truncated and only shows the beginning of `commonTranslations`; it does not show any `fr` translation entry, so there is no evidence that `translations.fr` was changed from a fallback to an explicit French dictionary or that all keys/emojis were translated/preserved.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the `de: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit German dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts`, providing German values for every existing key in `commonTranslations` (no spreading), preserving emojis/symbols.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` is truncated and does not show any `de` translation entry, so there is no evidence that `translations.de` was changed from a fallback to an explicit German dictionary or that all keys/emojis were translated/preserved.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` to describe broad frontend behavior/features (e.g., new game types, daily surprise section, quiz randomization) beyond the requested translation-pack changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for adding explicit French and German translation dictionaries in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` and does not request updating summary/metadata files or documenting unrelated functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` to add/track new feature requests (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) and mark them pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request changes to project tracking/state files; only translation pack updates were requested.
